item.description:
Ok this is an easy one.
If you already know this band then you're probably already on board; in fact you're so on board that they just made you captain.

If you haven't yet heard this band then hurry up before someone finds out.

Seriously, though, their 2010 album "Teen Dream" was on my short-list of best albums of 2010. The new album "Bloom" is no slouch either.

Here's a vid of Beach House........on the beach.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HgdPXp5phNY

Â 

Meetup details!:

Let's meetup at 7 at Intermission Tavern, and then we can head over to the Wilbur close to 8. Since a lot of the seats are assigned and the General Admission tickets sold out quickly, I imagine we're all scattered around the theater, so the meetup is pretty much for just before the show.
item.name: Beach House @ Wilbur Theater
